PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-07142022-06-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActCanadian Human Rights Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Human Rights Act (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN HUMAN RIGHTS ACT (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) repeal obsolete or spent regulatory provisions which have no current application; and (2) harmonize terms used in the Canadian Human Rights Benefit Regulations with those used in contemporary Canadian law and other federal statutes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0150 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
